channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Binance founder ‘CZ’ released from custody after four-month sentence
item.description: Binance founder Changpeng “CZ” Zhao was released from U.S. custody on Friday after serving out his four-month sentence in a low-security correctional ...

item.title: The Titan Submersible Hearings End With Few Solid Answers. Here’s What Comes Next
item.description: The Coast Guard hearings into the OceanGate disaster are done. Next comes the full report—and any potential criminal investigations.

item.title: Scientists Figured Out How to Recycle Plastic by Vaporizing It
item.description: A new technique could prevent tons of waste in the future—if it can scale.

item.title: OpenAI might raise the price of ChatGPT to $44 by 2029

item.title: The WordPress vs. WP Engine drama, explained

item.title: WordPress.org temporarily lifts its ban on WP Engine
item.description: WordPress.org has lifted its ban on hosting provider WP Engine until October 1, after putting a block on it earlier this week. The block prevented sev...

item.title: Trump’s $100,000 Watches Are the Most Tragic Celebrity Watch Yet
item.description: Former president Donald Trump wants you to buy gaudy, overpriced timepieces “made for those who combine boldness and elegance.” He got one part right.

item.title: Chat Podcasts Rule the Market—and Always Will
item.description: “That appointment—that relationship—is everything,” says audio executive Eric Eddings. But that doesn't mean the industry isn't innovating.

item.title: The Best Sex Machines for Solo, Couple, or Long-Distance Playtime (2024)
item.description: If you’re going to invest in toys to enhance your sex life, why not go big?
